about_the_game:
So, friends, buckle up because we’re taking off with The RIFT! A racing and shooting game that will get your adrenaline pumping! Imagine an explosive mix of piloting spaceships and the thrill of car racing, all sprinkled with a touch of strategy. Sounds good, right?

Dive into this dynamic sci-fi universe, where every trajectory and every shot count. It’s pure arcade gameplay, but with realistic physics that will glue you to your seat! For all sci-fi fans, racing enthusiasts, and competitive spirits, this is an experience you can’t miss. Ready to fire up those engines?!

Solo Campain

The solo campaign is at the heart of The RIFT! This central element of the game offers newcomers a progressively guided learning experience.

We start with a tutorial that introduces you to all the mechanics of the game. Then, you’ll jump into increasingly challenging campaign levels, perfect for getting familiar with the controls and the subtleties of piloting spaceships.

And for seasoned pilots, don’t worry! The campaign is also an ideal playground for challenging your friends. Achieving the best times is the little extra that spices up the gameplay experience with a competitive spirit that will bring out your inner beast!

Every race is a golden opportunity to earn medals and rewards based on your performance. And on top of that, new tracks will be regularly added through updates! Ready to take on the challenge?

Multiplayer

Get ready, because The RIFT plunges you into an intense and competitive multiplayer mode that will deliver thrilling moments! Servers will be available for you to battle it out with friends or players from around the world.

Pilots have the freedom to choose their favorite tracks for epic duels. Create your maps, share your skills, challenge your friends, and dive into a variety of competitions—it's a party!

Editor Mode

The editor mode allows players to create their own races. Fire up your imagination!

With assets and a dedicated tool at your disposal, this mode enhances the overall experience by promoting collaboration and sharing.

And that’s not all! Procedural tools are available to save you precious time when creating biomes. So, are you ready to design the race of your dreams and challenge your friends on your own creations?

Competition & E-Sport

Hang on tight, because the competitive aspect of The RIFT is in the game’s DNA! As soon as speed is involved, the desire to outdo oneself takes over. Competition isn’t just against others; it’s also a challenge against yourself. Breaking your own record? Believe me, it’s not always an easy task!

And let’s talk about the e-sport potential, which is simply immense! The game’s mechanical depth, combined with a focus on player competition, creates the perfect playground for thrilling tournaments. But that’s not all! Special attention is also given to the spectator experience, a crucial element of the e-sport mode. Get ready, because the spectacle promises to be breathtaking! Who will be the ultimate champion in the arena of The RIFT?

Personalization

The RIFT offers you vessel customization that will take your gaming experience to the next level! The options are vast: choose and unlock vibrant skins, stylish vessel chassis, unique cockpit decorations, stickers, stunning VFX, and even special vessels to win through challenges!

Express your style, add that unique touch to your vessel, and show the world who you are! This not only enhances immersion and creativity but also creates a strong bond between players and their gaming experience. Get your chrome and carbon ready: let’s dazzle the eyes!

Spectator Mode

To all my competition enthusiasts: this message is for you. The spectator mode of Rift Racing will amaze you with a multitude of practical and entertaining uses! You can view races from different angles, ideal for optimizing your trajectories and refining your technique.

But that’s not all! You’ll be able to follow in real-time the best times of other players and competitors online on the same server. It’s like having an overview of the battle for first place!

And to immortalize these epic moments, an advanced photo mode is also at your disposal. Capture every action, every tight turn, and every glorious victory!

Procedural Tools

For the development of Rift Racing, we’re relying on procedural generation tools that are truly impressive! With the Procedural Content Generation (PCG) tool and the well-known wave function collapse algorithm, we can quickly create biomes and worlds that will blow your mind.

These tools aren’t just there for show; they speed up the development process while providing a solid foundation for immersive environments. But beware, the touch of an expert artist is essential to refine the details and ensure breathtaking visual coherence.

And that’s not all! We’ve adapted this procedural tool to make it accessible even to non-experts. This means anyone can create their own races in environments generated almost instantly and automatically. So, are you ready to unleash your creativity and bring your own tracks to life?

Contemplation

In addition to its competitive racing modes, Rift Racing invites you to slow down with a contemplative mode! This mode allows you to freely explore the environment and fully enjoy the breathtaking landscapes and all their easter eggs.

Here, players can wander through futuristic settings, admire dynamic lighting effects, and immerse themselves in the richness and diversity of the game world’s textures. It’s a real treat for the eyes!

By offering the opportunity to admire the scenery without the pressure of competition, Rift Racing adds a soothing and aesthetic dimension. It’s the perfect chance to relax and appreciate every meticulous detail of this futuristic universe. So, are you ready to take a break from the race and savor the beauty of this world?!

short_description: This groundbreaking shooter racing game combines spacecraft piloting with traditional car racing and precision shooting. Immerse yourself in a vibrant sci-fi universe where arcade-style gameplay meets realistic physics. I hope you’re strapped in tight: welcome to The Rift.
